maqras.text: 20|83|`Mūsā yo, naze anata wa, jibun no min yori hanare, sakinjite isogu no ka.'
20|84|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Kare-ra wa, watashi no ashiato o otte mairimasu. Omo yo, watashi wa anata ga o yorokobi ni naru yō isoida nodesu.'
20|85|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Hontōni ware wa anata no satta nochi anata no min o kokoromitaga, sāmirī ga kare-ra o mayowa seta.'

20|86|Sokode mūsā wa, ikari kanashinde min no moto ni kaeri, itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, anata gata no omo wa, yoi yakusoku o anata gata ni musuba renakatta nodesu ka. Anata gata ni wa amarini nagai yakusoku no yō ni omowa reta nodesu ka. Soretomo omo kara no o ikari ga anata gata ni kudaru koto o nozonda nodesu ka. Dakara watashi to no yakusoku o chigaeta nodesu ka.'

20|87|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa jibun ni tashikana konkyo ga atte, anata to no yakusoku o yabutta node wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa Ejiputo hito no, sōshoku-hin no omoni o owasa retanode, sore o (hi no naka ni) nageireta nodesu. Sāmirī mo nagekonda yō nidesu.'
20|88|Sokode kare (sāmirī) wa, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, hoeru koushi no gūzō o tsukutta. Soshite itta. `Kore wa anata gata no kami de, mata mūsā no kamidesu, kare wa wasureta nodesu.'
20|89|Soreha, hitokoto mo kare-ra ni kotaezu, mata kare-ra ni gai mo naku eki mo nai koto ga wakaranai nodearou ka.

20|90|Hārūn wa (kono koto no) mae ni, jūbun ni kare-ra ni itta. `Hitobito yo. Anata gata wa kore ni yotte kokoromi rareru nodesu. Omo wa, hontōni jihibukai katadesu. Dakara watashi ni shitagai, watashi no meirei ni fukujū shi nasai.'
20|91|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, mūsā ga kaette kuru made,(koushi) o ogami tsudzukerudeshou.'
20|92|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Hārūn yo, kare-ra ga mayou no o mita toki, nani ga anata (no gimu no rikō) o samatageta nodesu ka.
20|93|Watashi ni shitagawanai nodesu ka. Watashi no meirei ni somuku nodesu ka.'

20|94|Kare (hārūn) wa itta. `Watashi no haha no ko yo, watashi no hige ya atama (no kami) o tsukamu no o tomete kudasai. Hontōni watashi wa anata ga,“Isuraeru no shison no ma o bunretsu sa semashita. Mata jibun no kotoba o mamorimasendeshita. ” To iu no o osoreta nodesu.'
20|95|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `De wa sāmirī yo, anata no (okonatta koto no) mokuteki wa nandesuka.'

20|96|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, kare-ra no minakatta mono o mita nodesu. Sorede shito no ashiato kara hitonigiri no (tsuchi) o totte, sore o (koushi no zō) ni nagetsuketa nodesu. Watashi no kokoro ga, sō watashi ni shisa shita nodesu.'

20|97|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Dete iki nasai. Ikite iru kagiri wa,“-fuka sawa” to iu koto ni narou. Kesshite yaburenai yakusoku (shobatsu) ga anata ni wa aru. Anata ga nomerikonde sūhai shite ita kamigami o mi nasai. Watashi-tachi wa kon'na mono wa yaite umi no naka ni makichirasudeshou.
20|98|(Hitobito yo) hontōni anata gata no kami wa arrā dakedesu. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodesu. Kare wa, subete no mono o sono o chishiki ni hōyō nasa remasu.'
20|99|Kono yō ni ware wa, izen ni okotta shōsoku o anata ni katari, waga moto kara anata ni kunkai o kudashita.
20|100|Dare demo sore ni somuku mono wa, fukkatsu no hi ni kanarazu omoni o oudearou.
20|101|Kare-ra wa itsu made mo kono jōtai no mamadearu. Fukkatsu no hi no omoni koso, kare-ra ni tori wazawaidearu.
20|102|Rappa ga fuka reru hi, kono Ni~Tsu ware wa kumotta me no tsumibukaimono o shōshū suru.
20|103|Kare-ra wa sasayaki atte,`anata gata wa 10 (Ni~Tsu) mo taizai shinakattadearou.' To iu.
20|104|Ware wa kare-ra no iou to suru koto o yoku shitte iru. Sonotoki mo seko ni taketa mono ga,`watashi-tachi no taizai wa 1-nichi ni mo naranai.' To iudearou.
20|105|Kare-ra wa yama ni tsuite, anata ni toudearou. Sokode itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi no omo wa, sore o konagona ni shite maki chirasa reru.
20|106|Kare wa, sore o tairana hirachi ni nasa re,
20|107|soko ni wa, magari mo ōtotsu mo minaideshou.'
20|108|Sonohi kare-ra wa yobi-te ni shitagai hagureru wake ni wa ikanai. Jihibukai okata no gozende wa,-goe wa hikuku nari, shinobiashi no oto no soto wa kikanaidearou.
20|109|Sonohi, jihibukai okata ni o yurushi o ete iru mono igai no torinashi wa muekidearou. Sono-sha no kotoba wa, kare ni ukeire rareru.
20|110|Kare wa, kare-ra no mae ni aru koto, ushiro ni aru koto o shitte ora reru. Daga kare-ra (ningen) no chishikide wa, sore o hakari shiru koto wa dekinai.
